amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of a program to award grants for the development of agricultural biotechnology with respect to the developing world.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a section regarding agricultural biotechnology research and development for the developing world.

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
